channel.title: hugo on Veerendra's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Veerendra's Blog

item.title: Moving to Hugo and other updates!
item.description: It has been 2 years since I wrote a new post. Due to busy work, moving to a new city, new jobs and getting married, I wasn’t able to keep up with writing blog posts. Finally, I’m back now, I have been thinking of changing blog themes for a long time. I spent some time exploring Jekyll themes and tried to modify them according to my requirements. As you can see here GitHub issue.
